title: Shelley's spicy potatoes
ingredients: ['500g baby new potatoes', '2 large onions, finely sliced', '2 garlic cloves, finely sliced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 generous teaspoon Madras curry powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', "1/2 bird's eye chilli", '1/2 teaspoon mustard seeds', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
